name: NSColor
desc: An object that stores color data and sometimes opacity (alpha value).

items.name: withSystemEffect
items.desc: Returns a new color object that represents the current color modified to include the specified visual effect.

items.name: NSColor.SystemEffect
items.desc: Constants for user interactions that change the appearance of a view or control.

items.name: usingColorSpace
items.desc: Creates a new color object representing the color of the receiver in the specified color space.

items.name: blended
items.desc: Creates a new color object whose component values are a weighted sum of the receiver’s and the specified color object's.

items.name: withAlphaComponent
items.desc: Creates a new color object that has the same color space and component values as the receiver, but the specified alpha component.

items.name: highlight
items.desc: Creates a new color object that represents a blend between the current color and the highlight color.

items.name: shadow
items.desc: Creates a new color object that represents a blend between the current color and the shadow color.

items.name: usingColorSpaceName
items.desc: Creates a new color object whose color is the same as the receiver’s, except that the new NSColor is in the specified color space.

items.name: ignoresAlpha
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the app supports alpha.

items.name: write
items.desc: Writes the receiver’s data to the specified pasteboard.

items.name: getCyan
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s CMYK and opacity values.

items.name: getHue
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s HSB component and opacity values in the respective arguments.

items.name: getRed
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s RGB component and opacity values in the respective arguments.

items.name: getWhite
items.desc: Returns the grayscale and alpha values of the color.

items.name: numberOfComponents
items.desc: The number of components in the color.

items.name: getComponents
items.desc: Returns the components of the receiver as an array.

items.name: alphaComponent
items.desc: The alpha (opacity) component value of the color.

items.name: whiteComponent
items.desc: The white component value of the color.

items.name: redComponent
items.desc: The red component value of the color.

items.name: greenComponent
items.desc: The green component value of the color.

items.name: blueComponent
items.desc: The blue component value of the color.

items.name: cyanComponent
items.desc: The cyan component value of the color.

items.name: magentaComponent
items.desc: The magenta component value of the color.

items.name: yellowComponent
items.desc: The yellow component value of the color.

items.name: blackComponent
items.desc: The black component value of the color.

items.name: hueComponent
items.desc: The hue component value of the color.

items.name: saturationComponent
items.desc: The saturation component value of the color.

items.name: brightnessComponent
items.desc: The brightness component value of the color.

items.name: catalogNameComponent
items.desc: The catalog containing the color’s name.

items.name: localizedCatalogNameComponent
items.desc: The localized version of the catalog name containing the color.

items.name: colorNameComponent
items.desc: The name of the color.

items.name: localizedColorNameComponent
items.desc: The localized version of the color name.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of the color object.

items.name: usingType
items.desc: Returns a version of the color object that is compatible with the specified color type.

items.name: NSColor.ColorType
items.desc: Constants indicating the color's type, and which methods may be called on the color object.

items.name: colorSpace
items.desc: The color space associated with the color.

items.name: colorSpaceName
items.desc: The name of the color space associated with the color.

items.name: cgColor
items.desc: The Core Graphics color object corresponding to the color.

items.name: drawSwatch
items.desc: Draws the current color in the given rectangle.

items.name: set
items.desc: Sets the color of subsequent drawing to the color that the receiver represents.

items.name: setFill
items.desc: Sets the fill color of subsequent drawing to the receiver’s color.

items.name: setStroke
items.desc: Sets the stroke color of subsequent drawing to the receiver’s color.

items.name: systemColorsDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Sent when the system colors have changed, such as through a system control panel interface.

items.name: currentControlTintDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Sent after the user changes control tint preference.
